snippet.title: Gunny Bunny ++: Double Sight Walkthrough
snippet.description:
2022 EDIT: Since Adobe Flash is dead, you can no longer play this game normally through websites. Either get the Ruffle extension or download BlueMaxima's Flashpoint to continue playing.

Of course, you can take a third option and download the game (and its predecessor) through here (EXE files lifted from Net Terminator's "disiwohuo" Google Site years before it went down; tested both files and they still work fine, and they're safe!): https://mega.nz/file/EhcHwSZD#ZLvWG-mJHmpuxc1VXHyB1FOJXVQkhtJCGSbxZdEF0Bk

Thumbnail based on render by 3DBBQ from DeviantArt.

Note: Bandicam's watermark blocks my health meter, though you may still notice how much health I have left when the screen shakes from me taking damage. You may even see through the letters to predict how much health I have left, though if the "JUICE" text below the meter is red... that should be pretty obvious.
